sources.title: I'm Just Curious (1944)
sources.description: For misbehaving, Little Lulu gets a spanking from Daddy with the book "Art of Self Defense" in her pants. In the shower, after being sent to her room, Lulu starts to sing "I'm Just Curious." Later Lulu sneaks out and goes after a chicken hawk who, thinking that he's a stork, tries to get Lulu's chickens from her family's henhouse. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/im-just-curious-1944/

metadata.Plot: Little LuLu lets her curiosity get her in trouble.
metadata.Actors: Carl Meyer, Cecil Roy, Arnold Stang
